roles.name: Accounts Controller
roles.description: Owns the 11-tab Master Operations Sheet and unified ledger.

roles.name: Bookkeeper
roles.description: AU-compliant records (Sole Trader, No-GST, Super, BAS prep).

roles.name: Square Manager
roles.description: Live invoicing, payments, and client contact record synchronization.

roles.name: Staff Scheduler
roles.description: Connecteam roster management and staff shift assignments.

roles.name: Clinical Documenter
roles.description: High-risk MH shift notes & court-defensible incident reports (ABC format).

roles.name: Calendar Master
roles.description: Google Calendar integration for all cleans and business appointments.

roles.name: Task Logger
roles.description: Timestamping every action to the Master Ops Sheet Task Log.

roles.name: Email Manager
roles.description: Monitoring Gmail for business tasks and client communications.

roles.name: Dashboard Manager
roles.description: Updating the Pulse Mini App live on Vercel with real-time data.

roles.name: Lead Gen Specialist
roles.description: Managing 1,600+ Apollo leads and tracking commercial outreach.

roles.name: Social Media Manager
roles.description: FB/IG content creation and before/after transformation posts.

roles.name: Secret Guard
roles.description: Scanning pushes and guarding credentials with pre-push checks.

roles.name: Pre-Flight Validator
roles.description: Mandatory internal audit of facts and Square data before replying.

roles.name: Memory Architect
roles.description: Search-optimized memory restructuring and daily log consolidation.

roles.name: Communications Agent
roles.description: Twilio SMS & WhatsApp confirmations for bookings and payments.

roles.name: Automation Orchestrator
roles.description: Spawning isolated sub-agents for heavy background data processing.

roles.name: Donation Manager
roles.description: Handling Arieta's private expense mapping and privacy wall.

roles.name: Skill Creator
roles.description: Designing and packaging specialized tools for workspace gaps.

roles.name: Airbnb Coordinator
roles.description: Tracking turnovers and guest checkouts across 5 properties.

roles.name: NDIS Specialist
roles.description: Enforcing NDIS compliance rates ($58.03/hr) and documentation.

patterns.description: GST set to NO (Hafsah not registered)
